articles.title: Gerry 'The Monk' Hutch wore a bumbag as he had dinner with blonde woman before dramatic arrest - Irish Mirror

articles.content:

articles.title: Vega VV19 Successfully Launches Pléiades Neo and SunStorm, RadCube and LEDSAT CubeSats - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Europe’s Vega has delivered Pléiades Neo-4 and four auxiliary payloads, SunStorm, RadCube and LEDSAT developed through ESA, and BRO-4, to their planned orbits. Liftoff of flight VV19 from Europe’s Spaceport in French Guiana came at 02:47 BST on August 17 (03:…
articles.content:
Vega liftoff on flight VV19. Credit: ESA/CNES/Arianespace-JM Guillon
